plot: An alcoholic, retired soldier, suffering from the loss of his wife to a drunk driver struggles to keep his sanity after his 14 year old daughter dies of a drugs overdose. Mack vows revenge on the dealer responsible for her death.
title: Avise la fin
plot_es: An alcoholic, retired soldier, suffering from the loss of his wife to a drunk driver struggles to keep his sanity after his 14 year old daughter dies of a drugs overdose. Mack vows revenge on the dealer responsible for her death.
plot_en: An alcoholic, retired soldier, suffering from the loss of his wife to a drunk driver struggles to keep his sanity after his 14 year old daughter dies of a drugs overdose. Mack vows revenge on the dealer responsible for her death.
